name: The Last Airbender (M. Night Shyamalan)
description:
The Last Airbender (M. Night Shyamalan) is an action game developed by THQ. It came out on 29-06-2010. It was published by THQ. The Last Airbender (M. Night Shyamalan) has a Metascore of 53, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play The Last Airbender (M. Night Shyamalan) on Wii and Nintendo DS.
